text: Novosphingobium taihuense is a bacterium from the genus of Novosphingobium which has been isolated from lake sediments from the Taihu Lake in China. Novosphingobium taihuense has the ability to degrade phenol, aniline, nitrobenzene, 4-chloronitrobenzene and phenanthrene. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Novosphingobium taihuense at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2005 Category:Sphingomonadales
title: Novosphingobium taihuense
